metadata.title: Yingzhen Women 's 2 Piece Outfits, Long Sleeve Leopard Patchwork Zip Top and Long Pants Set Tracksuit
features: Material: Made of 97%polyester +3%spandex. Very breathable fabric, skin-friendly and warm. Soft and light fabric provides you an absolute comfort.
Feature: Leopard patchwork. Top: Zip closure, lapel, long sleeve. Long Pants: Pull on closure, side pockets, elastic waistband, easy to put on & take off.
Design: 2 piece fall outfits, casual style and leopard print, make you look energetic, cute and fashionable. You will be the shiniest one in the crowd.
Best Gift: Great to pair it with sneakers, short boots, slippers, etc. A nice gift for adult women, young ladies and teen girls on birthday or other holidays.
Occasion: Perfect for daily wear, going out, vacation, leisure, party, vacation, workout, sports, Yoga, ordinary days, dating, club, or lounging at home.
description: 2 Pcs Lady's Leopard Print Splicing Casual Suit, Long Sleeve Stand Collar Zipper Cardigan
Size: S      Bust: 90cm/35.43 inches        Waist: 68cm/26.77 inches
Size: M      Bust: 96cm/37.80 inches        Waist: 74cm/29.13 inches
Size: L      Bust: 102cm/40.16 inches       Waist: 80cm/31.50 inches
Size: XL     Bust: 108cm/42.52 inches       Waist: 86cm/33.86 inches
1. Please kindly allow 2-3% difference according to manual measurement.
2. Please check the measurement chart carefully before you buy the item. (1 inch = 2.54 cm)
3. Please note that slight color difference should be acceptable due to the light and screen.
If the product has any quality problems, please feel free to contact us, we will help you solve the problem as quickly as possible.
